Sql.query: SELECT BARRCODI,SUM(SUMA) AS TOTAL,BARRNOMBRE FROM ( select sum(c.tentdesumadia) AS SUMA,a.BARRCODI,b.BARRNOMBRE,a.PERICODI from trn_trans_entrega a join trn_barra b on a.barrcodi=b.barrcodi join trn_trans_entrega_detalle c on a.TENTCODI=c.TENTCODI where a.PERICODI=:PERICODI group by a.barrcodi,b.BARRNOMBRE,a.PERICODI UNION select sum(c.tretdesumadia)*-1 AS SUMA,a.BARRCODI,b.BARRNOMBRE,a.PERICODI from trn_trans_retiro a join trn_barra b on a.BARRCODI =b.BARRCODI JOIN trn_trans_retiro_detalle c on a.TRETCODI= c.TRETCODI where a.PERICODI=:PERICODI group by a.BARRCODI,b.BARRNOMBRE,a.PERICODI ORDER BY BARRCODI ASC ) T GROUP BY BARRCODI,BARRNOMBRE
